name: RiskCube
headline: We help insurance broker & agents scale their business with AI.
description: RiskCube is software for insurance brokers and agents with a dedicated focus on property & casualty risks. We start with risk software for business property to help brokers generate more revenue and stay competitive. Our AI-powered automation platform streamlines operations by automating data entry, compliance, quoting, and policy management. This reduces contract processing from weeks to days, allowing brokers to focus on their business and clients rather than backend operations.

founders.name: Andrei Craciunescu, Founder
founders.description: Andrei is the Founder & CEO of RiskCube, an AI-driven platform specializing in property & casualty risks such as hurricanes, floods, and wildfires. With over five years of experience at WTW, one of the world’s largest commercial insurance brokers, Andrei brings deep expertise in risk management and is transforming how brokers can build and scale global technology.

# AI-Driven Insurance Brokerage for Property & Casualty Risks
Supporting Businesses and Insurance Agents in Identifying Climate Risks, Such as Floods and Hurricanes, and Securing the Most Relevant Insurance Coverage.
[Book a Demo](https://riskcube.com/<https:/calendly.com/andrei-craciunescu/demo>)[Get Early Access](https://riskcube.com/<#>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/6708c7e9704eb564a72ada61_Backed%20by%20Y%20Combinator.svg)
backed and supported by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/6708c027158e74274af8e783_Y%20Combinator%20logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/6699c618d46b618a5ad223d7_1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/6699c65afa2a8d230a76f339_2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/6699c668d25ed1fe3fdffc27_3.png)
## How to Use Our Risk Assessment Tool
01
Input your location data—or, partner directly with us, and we’ll integrate it for you.
02
View your tailored climate dashboard with risk analysis data and insights.
03
Generate customized risk compliance reports with just one click.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/66b0d76760e077b9fe412f5d_map-mobile.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/669b1cc7a670fd2a6a5a537d_map-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/66afd700027cbabd9ab0a292_map-2.png)
Map from [**Probable Futures**](https://riskcube.com/<https:/probablefutures.org/>)
## Use Cases
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/66cce6bf887cb94e34d7f03c_altana%20logo%20image.png)
Property Insurance Management
Altana AG is a global leader in specialty chemicals, dedicated to innovation and sustainability. With operations in over 100 countries, Altana AG is focused on mitigating the impacts of climate-related risks across its supply chain and production sites.
[Learn More](https://riskcube.com/</our-pilot-project-with-altana-ag-innovating-climate-risk-management>)
Parametric Insurance Structures
RiskCube helps businesses analyze disaster risks and secure tailored parametric insurance with automatic payouts for quick liquidity and cost savings.
[Read More](https://riskcube.com/</parametric-insurance-structures>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/669f11a99ea731352957ed4d_Strategic%20Corporate%20Decisions.png)
Regulation Compliance
RiskCube automates data collection and analysis for climate regulations, ensuring compliance with CSRD, TCFD, and Supply Chain Act requirements.
[Read More](https://riskcube.com/</regulation-compliance>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/669f18308393c5dea27b649a_3.png)
Climate Risk Due Diligence
RiskCube provides detailed insights into how climate change affects asset risk in M&A deals, ensuring accurate valuations and proper insurance coverage.
[Read More](https://riskcube.com/</climate-risk-due-diligence>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/669f183e6bffdf98a44cbf0d_4.png)
Property Insurance Management
Our tool helps assess climate risks and determine adequate property insurance coverage, enabling proactive risk management and strategic planning.
[Read More](https://riskcube.com/</property-insurance-management>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/669f1819b9ae0d716e2a019f_1.png)
Parametric Insurance Structures
RiskCube helps businesses analyze disaster risks and secure tailored parametric insurance with automatic payouts for quick liquidity and cost savings.
[Read More](https://riskcube.com/</parametric-insurance-structures>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/669f11a99ea731352957ed4d_Strategic%20Corporate%20Decisions.png)
Regulation Compliance
RiskCube automates data collection and analysis for climate regulations, ensuring compliance with CSRD, TCFD, and Supply Chain Act requirements.
[Read More](https://riskcube.com/</regulation-compliance>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/669f18308393c5dea27b649a_3.png)
Climate Risk Due Diligence
RiskCube provides detailed insights into how climate change affects asset risk in M&A deals, ensuring accurate valuations and proper insurance coverage.
[Read More](https://riskcube.com/</climate-risk-due-diligence>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66993b4b766aba6138876c22/669f183e6bffdf98a44cbf0d_4.png)

generated_description:
**RiskCube: Simplifying Insurance with AI**

**Overview**
RiskCube, founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch F24, is a burgeoning startup headquartered in San Francisco. With a small but focused team of two, RiskCube leverages AI to revolutionize how insurance brokers and agents manage property and casualty risks.

**Mission**
RiskCube’s mission is straightforward: to empower insurance brokers and agents to scale their businesses effectively through advanced AI solutions. By automating essential processes, they enable these professionals to focus on what matters: building relationships and serving clients.

**What They Do**
Initially focusing on risk software for business properties, RiskCube’s AI-powered platform automates tedious tasks like data entry, compliance, quoting, and policy management. The result? What typically takes weeks can now be completed in days, letting brokers return their attention to clients rather than getting bogged down in backend operations.

The platform is particularly well-equipped to tackle the growing complexities of climate risks. It provides brokers with tools to identify and secure relevant insurance coverage against potential disasters like floods and hurricanes.

**Key Features**
1. **Risk Assessment Tool**: Users can input location data to generate climate risk dashboards and customized compliance reports.
2. **Use Cases**:
   - **Property Insurance Management**: Helps businesses, like Altana AG, manage climate risks across their operations.
   - **Parametric Insurance Structures**: Facilitates tailored insurance policies that ensure quick liquidity and cost efficiency.
   - **Regulation Compliance**: Streamlines compliance with various climate-related regulations.
   - **Climate Risk Due Diligence**: Offers insights into asset risks for M&A transactions, ensuring that valuations are accurate and that proper insurance is in place.

**Location and Team**
Located in the heart of the San Francisco Bay Area, RiskCube is led by Nicolas Dessaigne, who serves as the Group Partner. Their small team fosters agility and innovation in a fast-paced fintech landscape.

**Join the Movement**
RiskCube is actively seeking to expand its user base, inviting brokers and agents to book a demo and join their waitlist for early access to their powerful platform. With a unique focus on trust in the insurance industry, they aim to make risk management accessible and efficient for all sizes of businesses.

**In Summary**
In a world where climate change poses new challenges to the insurance industry, RiskCube stands out as a forward-thinking partner. With its AI-driven automation and dedication to improving operational efficiency, it promises to redefine how insurance brokers engage with technology. For more information, visit [RiskCube’s website](https://riskcube.com).
